subtitle: A beautiful and delicious accompaniment to meat or fish; or add some mozzarella or feta cheese for a main meal.

method.text: Blanch the carrot in boiling water for 1-2 min before plunging into cold water. Drain well.
In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, garlic, celery salt and seasoning. Add all the sliced vegetables. Mix thoroughly.
Preheat grill to medium, or a non-stick ribbed frying pan. Cook the vegetables for about 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>2</sub> min each side until crisp but not soft.
Combine dressing ingredients ina screw-top jar. Shake together thoroughly. Pour half onto the freshly cooked vegetables.
Divide lettuce leaves between seving plates. Top with the grilled vegetables. Sprinkle with chopped salad onions. Serve with remaining dressing.

title: Grilled vegetable salad
